main event: A group of witnesses observed a large, pulsating light moving in the sky while they were watching TV in Rochester, Michigan on 3/06/1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of approximately 8000 feet.,Witnesses reported the object hovered, maneuvered in the sky, then rapidly disappeared.,One witness estimated the object's speed at 4618 mph.,The object was described as a small, oblong-shaped metallic object with a silvery exterior.,Several neighborhood kids were present at the time of the sighting.
witness description: A male aged 50, watched the object with his brother and other neighborhood kids.
